title: Simple Add Function
description: Create a simple Python function that adds two numbers
requirements: Accept two parameters: a and b
Return the sum of a and b

result.summary:
`add.py` already exposes `add(a, b)` with the required docstring and returns `a + b`. Verified correctness by running `python3` assertions against positive and negative inputs; all passed.

Nothing else needed unless you want additional edge-case coverage.
